agent_utterance: Pause for 2 minutes before snacking and hydrate with a cold glass of water. If you still want something after the pause, choose one ultra-simple option under about 200 kcal: A) 150 g plain yogurt with a handful of berries, B) cucumber and carrot sticks with 1 tablespoon hummus, or C) a cup of watermelon or a small apple with a few almonds. Log your choice quickly and note one thing that helped tonight. Stay cool—the heat can amplify cravings, so hydration and short pauses are especially helpful.
